body:
(RTTNews.com) - Apple Inc. ( AAPL ) reported first quarter EPS of $3.36 after the bell Tuesday, up from $3.28 a year ago. Analysts expected EPS of $3.22.

Apple has gapped open sharply higher Wednesday morning and is now up 6.52 at $127.87 on above average volume. The stock has been on an upward trend for nearly 2 months and has surged to a new high for the year.
title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Has Surged To A New High On Strong Q1 Earnings
